snippet: The budget talks offer an opportunity to impose a war tax. By tying military action to additional revenue, the president would have a freer hand in deciding when to use force.
abstract: Op-Ed article by R Russell Rumbaugh, Army veteran and former Central Intelligence Agency analyst, calls for federal budget to institute war tax to fund wars the United States military is asked to fight.
lead_paragraph: The budget talks offer an opportunity to impose a war tax. By tying military action to additional revenue, the president would have a freer hand in deciding when to use force.
